successes.title: Jagged Alliance: Flashback
successes.description: The Godfather of turn-based RPG action is making its comeback! Mercenaries, guns and sarcastic humor galore!

Pledges.description: Pea Shooter Tier: By supporting you’re actively helping to bring back Jagged Alliance, thank you!
Supporter badge for the official JAF forum + You will be added to the official website credit list
Support your Fellow Man Tier: You’re doing the right thing, so you get:
The Jagged Alliance Classics Pack (Also included in the $5 Tier and up) + Official digital sound track (ONLY THIS TIER) + Get half price off the game once released
Groin Attack Tier - ALL DIGITAL: Ouch! That hurts, but you’re still rewarded with:
Digital download of PC, Mac OSX or Linux DRM-free + Backer forum badge for the official JAF forum + You will be added to the official website credit list
Gunnam style Tier - ALL DIGITAL: Nothing like a gun to make you dance! You're rewarded with:
All previous rewards + Digital high quality map of the game world + Digital copy of the Official Soundtrack
$42 Ahh You’re That Guy Tier: I thought I recognized you, therefore you get:

All previous rewards + Get your name in the NPC name pool and write a simple short response. Every time you start a new game the names will be re-shuffled, so you have a chance to encounter your own NPC in the game.
Got a Bigger Gun Tier - ALL DIGITAL: Bigger is always better so you get:
All previous rewards + Digital high quality map of the game world + Digital copy of the Official Soundtrack + A digital copy of Jagged Alliance and Jagged Alliance 2 (English)
It's Time to Reload Tier: Get dem Bullets out! If you make it in time, you get:
All previous rewards + Digital high quality map of the game world + Digital copy of the Official Soundtrack + Early Access to the game + A Digital Documentary of the making of JA: Flashback
You’re on my List Tier: That’s why you’re in the game:

All previous rewards + Get your name in the Enemy name pool. Every time you start a new game the names will be re-shuffled, so you have a chance to encounter yourself on the battlefield. (If you go for the $85, $220 or $400 Tier, your response will be connected to the enemy name)
Low on Ammo Tier: There's always the melee option, there you get:

A boxed version of the game with a printed manual (ONLY THIS TIER) + Digital soundtrack + Digital map + Backer forum badge for the official JAF forum (Shipping is covered for the EU and the US but please add $25 if outside those areas )
Boom, Headshot! Tier - ALL DIGITAL: You must be out of your mind, but you’ll get:

All previous rewards + Digital tactics manual
- Digital Jagged Alliance: Flashback art book + Access to the Beta version of the game + An exclusive in-game vanity item + Special backer forum badge for the official JAF forum
Umpa Bazooka Tier - ALL DIGITAL: That's a mind blower. You're rewarded with:
All previous rewards + Get to write an enemy response (ONLY THIS TIER)
Van-Damn Good Tier: Yes you are, and that’s why we reward you with:
All previous rewards + Behind the scenes access to developer forum + The exclusive Backer t-shirt  (PHYSICAL)+ Your name in the ‘special thank you!’ credits roll
All Glory, No Brains Tier: FOR GLORY!, you get:
All previous rewards + Get a mercenary quote in the game - lots of mercenaries in the game means lots of quotes needed (ONLY THIS TIER)
Kidney Puncher Tier: You hit em where it hurts, so you get:
All previous rewards + Boxed collector’s Edition (PHYSICAL) + Collector forum badge for the official JAF forum
$200 Who be the fool Tier: Surely not you, so you get:
All previous rewards + you get to make a name for the enemy name pool (ONLY THIS TIER)
Aim for the eyes Tier: Yeah, that should do the trick, so you get:
All previous rewards + You get to choose to either write an enemy response or a mercenary one-liner (ONLY THIS TIER)
You’re Cocking it Wrong Tier: That’s what she said, but you’re still getting:

All previous rewards + Boxed Collectors Edition signed by the Development team (PHYSICAL) + Signed movie sized frameable poster (PHYSICAL) + Paperback copy of the the Jagged Alliance: Flashback art book (PHYSICAL - ONLY THIS TIER) + Access to the Alpha version of the game
$400 Tier: It’s all in the bag Tier: So bring it home and enjoy the rewards, you’ll get:
All previous rewards + A mercenary one-liner + An enemy response + You get to make a name for the enemy name pool + You get to write a NPC Quote. (ALL ONLY THIS TIER)
Bobby Trapped Tier: The man sure drives a hard bargain and therefore you get:

All previous rewards + Name a trash item in the game and co-write the item description (ONLY THIS TIER) + Signed Hardback copy of the Jagged Alliance: Flashback art book (PHYSICAL) + High quality Printed cloth map of the game world (PHYSICAL) + Your name on the wall of fame inside the game + First expansion pack for free
Woody Woodpecker Tier: You just can’t enough of all that wood, so you get:
All previous DIGITAL REWARDS + Become a manic woodcutter (Help co-design the woodcutter + co-write 3 responses)
